titles: A Declaration of the nobility and gentry of the County of VVorcester adhering to the late King
publisher: Printed for Charles Adams at the Talbot in Fleetstreet,
notes: Signed at end: The Earl of Shrewsbury, Thomas Lord Windsor, [and 21 others].
"In the hope of a settlement by Gen. Monk, they declare that they harbour no revenge, but wish for unity of mind as a nation." -- Cf. Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Royalists --  England --  Worcester --  Early works to 1800.
